items.name: CABBAGE AND CARROT SALAD
items.description: Shredded cabbage and carrot mixed freshly squeezed lime juice, tomato and ground peanut

items.name: GREEN PAPAYA SALAD
items.description: Green papaya in thin slices mixed with freshly squeezed lime juice, tomato and ground peanut

items.name: SHRIMP SALAD
items.description: Jumbo shrimp served on top of lettuce and mixed with onion, tomato, cucumber. Seasoned with an exotic Thai salad dressing

items.name: BEEF SALAD
items.description: Grilled sliced beef served on top lettuce and mixed with red onion, bell pepper, tomato and cucumber. Seasoned with an exotic Thai salad dressing

items.name: SPICY GROUND CHICKEN SALAD
items.description: Minced chicken sautéed and seasoned with Thai herbs and Thai spicy. Served with cool lettuce

items.name: HOUSE SALAD
items.description: Fresh green salad and shredded tofu with special peanut dressing

items.name: SIDE SALAD
items.description: Fresh green salad with ginger dressing

items.name: GOLDEN SHEET
items.description: Rice crepes filled with chicken and shrimp. Served with a special sauce

items.name: GYOZA
items.description: Pan – fried vegetable pot sticker

items.name: TINY SPRING ROLL
items.description:
Chicken mixed with silver noodle wrapped in
fine rice crepes. Served with Thai sweet & sauce

items.name: VEGETABLE SPRING ROLL
items.description: Vegetable wrapped fine rice crepes

items.name: SUMMER ROLL
items.description:
Fresh vegetable wrapped in thin rice pancake.
Served with sweet chili sauce and peanut sauce

items.name: FISHCAKES
items.description:
Minces fish mixed with chili paste and chopped
green beans then deep-fried to golden brown.
Served with cucumber salad topped with
ground peanut

items.name: CRISPY TOFU
items.description:
Deep - fried tofu. Served with plum sauce mixed
in crushed peanut

items.name: CRAB RANGOON
items.description: Cream Cheese/Crab Meat

items.name: FRIED WONTON
items.description: Ground Chicken/Wonton Skin

items.name: SOFT SHELL CRAB TEMPURA
items.description:
Crispy tempura soft shell crab in light batter .
Served  with ponzu sauce and sweet potato

items.name: SHRIMP TEMPURA
items.description:
Crispy tempura shrimp in light batter .
Served with tempura sauce

items.name: EDAMAME
items.description: Steam Japanese soy bean with seasonal salt on top

items.name: SEAWEED SALAD
items.description: Japanese seaweed mix with special sauce

items.name: SHU-MAI
items.description:
Shrimp dumpling steamed or pan fried.
Served with house sauce

items.name: GAI SATAY
items.description:
Marinated chicken strips on wooden skewers and
grilled with coconut milk. Served with peanut sauce
